location.zh-cn: 北京市东城区雍和宫大街

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的藏传佛教格鲁派寺院，最初为清朝雍正皇帝的府邸，后改为寺院。占地66000平方米，是北京最大的藏传佛教寺院。
description.en: A Tibetan Buddhist monastery of the Gelug school in Beijing. It was originally the residence of the Yongzheng Emperor of the Qing Dynasty and was later converted into a monastery. Covering an area of 66,000 square meters, it is the largest Tibetan Buddhist monastery in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，为皇四子胤禛（后来的雍正帝）修建了府邸，即雍和宫的前身。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, who built a residence for his fourth son, Yinzhen (the future Yongzheng Emperor), which would become the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第五位皇帝，雍和宫曾是其登基前的府邸。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Qing Dynasty. The Yonghe Temple was his residence before he ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第六位皇帝，雍正帝之子，出生于雍和宫，后将其正式改为藏传佛教寺院。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, son of the Yongzheng Emperor. He was born in the Yonghe Temple and later officially converted it into a Tibetan Buddhist monastery.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教的一个主要派别，雍和宫是其重要的寺院之一。
description.en: A major school of Tibetan Buddhism, of which the Yonghe Temple is an important monastery.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个封建王朝，雍和宫的建立和改建均在此朝代完成。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history, during which the Yonghe Temple was built and converted.

description.zh-cn: 明清两代的皇家宫殿，雍正帝即位后从雍和宫迁入此地。
description.en: The imperial palace for the Ming and Qing dynasties. The Yongzheng Emperor moved here from the Yonghe Temple after ascending the throne.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的重要活佛之一，曾在雍正年间居住于雍和宫。
description.en: One of the important living Buddhas (Khutukhtus) of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who resided in the Yonghe Temple during the Yongzheng era.

description.zh-cn: 清朝管理皇家事务的机构，曾负责雍和宫的改建工程。
description.en: The Qing dynasty agency responsible for managing the imperial household's affairs, which oversaw the reconstruction of the Yonghe Temple.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，于1961年批准雍和宫为全国重点文物保护单位。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, which approved the Yonghe Temple as a Major Historical and Cultural Site Protected at the National Level in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的重要领袖，曾于1954年在雍和宫法轮殿讲经。
description.en: An important leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who preached in the Hall of the Wheel of the Law at Yonghe Temple in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的重要领袖，曾于1954年在雍和宫法轮殿讲经。
description.en: An important leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who preached in the Hall of the Wheel of the Law at Yonghe Temple in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派领袖，曾向清廷进贡用于雕刻雍和宫弥勒佛站像的白檀木。
description.en: A leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who presented the white sandalwood used to carve the Maitreya Buddha statue in Yonghe Temple as tribute to the Qing court.

description.zh-cn: 北京市负责文物保护工作的政府机构，于1995年将雍和宫注册为博物馆。
description.en: The government agency responsible for cultural heritage protection in Beijing, which registered the Yonghe Temple as a museum in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 清朝管理边疆民族事务的中央机构，曾兼管雍和宫的具体事务。
description.en: The central government agency of the Qing Dynasty responsible for managing affairs of frontier ethnic groups, which also oversaw the specific affairs of the Yonghe Temple.

en: Bureau of Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs

description.zh-cn: 北洋政府时期管理蒙藏事务的机构，负责雍和宫的行政管理。
description.en: The agency responsible for Mongolian and Tibetan affairs during the Beiyang government period, which was in charge of the administration of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 南京国民政府及之后中华民国政府管理蒙藏事务的机构，北伐后接管雍和宫的管理。
description.en: The agency of the Nationalist Government and subsequent ROC government responsible for Mongolian and Tibetan affairs, which took over the management of the Yonghe Temple after the Northern Expedition.

nodes.id: 北京市民族事务委员会

zh-cn: 北京市民族事务委员会

description.zh-cn: 北京市负责民族和宗教事务的政府机构，雍和宫管理处是其下属单位。
description.en: The Beijing municipal government agency responsible for ethnic and religious affairs, under which the Yonghe Temple Management Office operates.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫管理处主任。
description.en: Former director of the Yonghe Temple Management Office.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫管理处主任。
description.en: Former director of the Yonghe Temple Management Office.

description.zh-cn: 清朝管理京城及周边地区藏传佛教寺院的机构，雍和宫的宗教事务受其领导。
description.en: The Qing dynasty agency for managing Tibetan Buddhist monasteries in and around the capital, which supervised the religious affairs of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性佛教组织，曾于1956年任命噶拉藏为雍和宫住持。
description.en: The national Buddhist organization of China, which appointed Galatsang as the abbot of Yonghe Temple in 1956.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫扎萨克喇嘛。
description.en: Former Jassak Lama of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫扎萨克喇嘛。
description.en: Former Jassak Lama of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫扎萨克喇嘛。
description.en: Former Jassak Lama of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫扎萨克喇嘛及北平喇嘛寺庙整理委员会主任委员。
description.en: Former Jassak Lama of the Yonghe Temple and chairman of the Beiping Lama Temples Reorganization Committee.

description.zh-cn: 新中国成立后雍和宫首任代理住持。
description.en: The first acting abbot of the Yonghe Temple after the founding of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫住持。
description.en: Former abbot of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫住持。
description.en: Former abbot of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 曾任雍和宫住持。
description.en: Former abbot of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 现任雍和宫住持。
description.en: The current abbot of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 雍和宫于1744年被乾隆皇帝正式改为藏传佛教格鲁派（黄教）寺院。
description.en: In 1744, the Yonghe Temple was officially converted by the Qianlong Emperor into a Tibetan Buddhist monastery of the Gelug (Yellow Hat) school.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝（胤禛）是康熙帝的皇四子。
description.en: The Yongzheng Emperor (Yinzhen) was the fourth son of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 乾隆帝（弘历）是雍正帝的儿子。
description.en: The Qianlong Emperor (Hongli) was the son of the Yongzheng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 康熙三十三年（1694年），康熙帝为皇四子胤禛修建了府邸，此为雍和宫的前身。
description.en: In the 33rd year of the Kangxi reign (1694), the Kangxi Emperor built a residence for his fourth son, Yinzhen, which was the predecessor of the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝登基前作为雍亲王居住于此府邸。
description.en: Before ascending the throne, the Yongzheng Emperor lived in this residence as Prince Yong.

description.zh-cn: 雍正三年（1725年），雍正帝将原雍王府潜邸升格为宫殿，并改名为雍和宫。
description.en: In the third year of the Yongzheng reign (1725), the Yongzheng Emperor upgraded his former residence, the Prince Yong Mansion, to a palace and renamed it Yonghegong (Palace of Harmony and Peace).

description.zh-cn: 乾隆九年（1744年），乾隆帝将雍和宫正式改为藏传佛教寺庙。
description.en: In the ninth year of the Qianlong reign (1744), the Qianlong Emperor officially converted the Yonghe Palace into a Tibetan Buddhist monastery.

description.zh-cn: 雍正帝在位时期，章嘉呼图克图活佛居住于雍和宫。
description.en: During the reign of the Yongzheng Emperor, the Jangkya Khutukhtu resided in the Yonghe Temple.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1961年，中华人民共和国国务院批准雍和宫为第一批全国重点文物保护单位。
description.en: In 1961, the State Council of the People's Republic of China approved the Yonghe Temple as one of the first Major Historical and Cultural Sites Protected at the National Level.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，十世班禅到北京时在雍和宫法轮殿讲经布道。
description.en: In 1954, when the 10th Panchen Lama visited Beijing, he preached at the Hall of the Wheel of the Law in the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，十四世达赖到北京时在雍和宫法轮殿讲经布道。
description.en: In 1954, when the 14th Dalai Lama visited Beijing, he preached at the Hall of the Wheel of the Law in the Yonghe Temple.

description.zh-cn: 雍和宫万福阁内的弥勒佛站像是由七世达赖进贡的白檀木雕刻而成。
description.en: The standing Maitreya Buddha statue in the Wanfu Pavilion of the Yonghe Temple was carved from white sandalwood presented as tribute by the 7th Dalai Lama.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，雍和宫获北京市文物局以“雍和宫藏传佛教艺术博物馆”名称登记注册为博物馆。
description.en: In 1995, the Yonghe Temple was registered as a museum by the Beijing Municipal Cultural Heritage Bureau under the name 'Yonghegong Tibetan Buddhist Art Museum'.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期，雍和宫的具体事务由理藩院兼管。
description.en: During the Qing Dynasty, the specific affairs of the Yonghe Temple were co-managed by the Lifan Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 1914年后，北洋政府时期雍和宫的行政管理由蒙藏院负责。
description.en: After 1914, during the Beiyang government period, the administration of the Yonghe Temple was under the responsibility of the Bureau of Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 北伐成功后，南京国民政府蒙藏委员会负责管理雍和宫。
description.en: After the success of the Northern Expedition, the Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Commission of the Nationalist Government was responsible for managing the Yonghe Temple.

relationships.target: 北京市民族事务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，雍和宫管理处成为北京市民族事务委员会（北京市宗教事务局）下属的事业单位。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, the Yonghe Temple Management Office became a public institution subordinate to the Beijing Municipal Ethnic Affairs Commission (Beijing Municipal Bureau of Religious Affairs).

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期，雍和宫的宗教事务由总管驻京喇嘛印务处领导。
description.en: During the Qing Dynasty, the religious affairs of the Yonghe Temple were supervised by the Office for the Administration of Lamas Stationed in the Capital.

description.zh-cn: 1956年1月，中国佛教协会任命噶拉藏为雍和宫住持。
description.en: In January 1956, the Buddhist Association of China appointed Galatsang as the abbot of the Yonghe Temple.

position.en: Director of Yonghe Temple Management Office
Director of Yonghe Temple Management Office

description.zh-cn: 于1987年至1988年2月任代理住持，1988年2月起正式担任住持。
description.en: Served as Acting Abbot from 1987 to February 1988, and officially became Abbot from February 1988.
